channel.title: Spider Man on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Spider Man on Game6r

item.title: Hanger
item.description: During the game Drunken Spiderman you have to help Spiderman get out of the trap that Doctor Octopus set for him. Using a special chemical composition, the insidious villain managed to intoxicate the spider, and then shackle him in special chains that completely blocked his reflexes and abilities. Playing drunk Spider-Man is very difficult, because due to the action of the intoxicating drug, your character is almost unable to move.

item.title: The Amazing Spiderman Online
item.description: The authors of the Spider-Man coloring game invite you to try your hand at the role of a cartoonist who designs characters for computer games. The company’s specialists have just begun to create a new game, the character of which will be a brave crime fighter - Spider-Man. This time you have to work with the image of Spiderman. Using the brush-shaped cursor, select the desired paint, and then indicate the areas of the picture that need to be painted.
